intro: Koellikeria argyrostigma var. genuina, commonly known as the silver-streaked koellikeria, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking silver-veined leaves. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sunlight, making it a popular choice for ornamental gardening. Due to its unique appearance and adaptability, it is often cultivated in tropical and subtropical regions.
